title: Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help
tags: ask the goblin priestess for help
content:
will gain the disapproval of Astarion and Wyll but Karlach will approve. Once you are ready, Guts will shut the door and reach into your mind, this will give you the following dialogue options.

Seal your mind against the intrusion. Allow her to rummage through your memories. Attack.

Choosing dialogue 1 will give you the following dialogue options. Choosing dialogue 2 will skip this dialogue selection.

Relax your mind, directing her to the memory of your infection. Shut her out completely.

C
